item.description:
Haven't seen them yet but love their stuff - flying solo on this one so anyone who wants to meet up is welcome (just bought my ticket today) :)

Lets make it easy and meet at 8:00PM at T's Pub for introductions and a beverage before heading over to the show. T's is located at 973 Comm Ave, right next door to The Paradise. I'll send an email with my phone # closer to the show.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0sf6DM-30DA&feature=relmfu
item.name: Neon Indian May 11 @ Paradise
